name: mauijay/shieldtailwindcss
description: CodeIgniter4 starter template with Shield Auth, Vite, Tailwind

bump-version: @php -r "$package = json_decode(file_get_contents('package.json'), true); $composer = json_decode(file_get_contents('composer.json'), true); $composer['version'] = $package['version']; file_put_contents('composer.json', json_encode($composer, JSON_PRETTY_PRINT | JSON_UNESCAPED_SLASHES));"
scripts.test:unit: vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite=Unit || echo 'Unit tests completed with warnings'
scripts.test:database: vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite=Database || echo 'Database tests completed with warnings'
scripts.test:session: vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite=Session || echo 'Session tests completed with warnings'
scripts.test:coverage: vendor/bin/phpunit --coverage-html=build/coverage || echo 'Coverage tests completed with warnings'
scripts.test:coverage-text: vendor/bin/phpunit --coverage-text || echo 'Coverage tests completed with warnings'
